llm_res.rule: The function `name()` should return the name of the token. This is an optional method but if implemented, it should return the actual token name.
transferFrom function should return true on successful transfer.
Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
llm_res.function: function _transfer(address from, address to, uint256 amount)

llm_res.rule: symbol function should return the symbol of the token.
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
